string.value: You should talk to #b#p1032101##k in #b#m101000000##k and see if the puppet-toting kid has made any more appearances in the South Forest.

#p1032101# says that the kid with the puppet has showed up once again in #m100040003# and wants you to eliminate the #o1110100#s and retrieve the puppet yet again.


Regardless of Personality #o9101000##r #a217181##k
#i4032318# #t4032318# #b#c4032318# / 1#k
You defeated the #o1110100# and retrieved the #t4032318#. So far, you've managed to foil the kid's plan times times. Perhaps the kid'll give up now…?

I just received a report that the kid showed up again at the Southern Forest, and this time #p1032112# even warned the kid to stop, only to be told he'd get his branches broken off if he tried to stop the kid. Then the boy disappeared.

It'd be nice to catch the kid, but since we can't, we'll just have to eliminate the #o1110100#s and gather #t4032318#s again. And just like last time, you can just defeat whichever #o1110100# you see, regardless of their personality.

Now please head over to #m100040003# once more. There, I want you to eliminate #r100 #o1110100#s, regardless of their personality#k, and retrieve the #b#t4032318##k as well. You've already done this before, so it won't shouldn't take you too long.
I am sorry I keep asking you to do the same favor over and over again… but there's nothing else we can do about it. Let me know if you have a change of heart.
Did you manage to eliminate the #o1110100#s and retrieve the #t4032318#? Hah… I apologize for making the same request over and over again.

We have retrieved a #t4032318# three times already. I don't see why the kid wants to make the #o1110100# more violent, but I'd like nothing more than for that kid to stop showing up and causing trouble.
You still haven't defeated #r100 #o1110100#s#k and retrieved the #b#t4032318##k? I see that you're much last stronger than last time, so I don't see why this is taking too long.
You still haven't defeated #r100 #o1110100#s#k and retrieved the #b#t4032318##k? I see that you're much last stronger than last time, so I don't see why this is taking too long.
